meanings.definition: Allowing liquid or gas to pass through a crack or hole.
meanings.sent1: The old bucket was the leakiest one in the shed.
meanings.sent2: The leakiest pipe in the house needed urgent repair.
meanings.sent3: The leakiest umbrella decided to rain indoors instead of outside.
meanings.sent4: Her excuses were the leakiest of all, unable to hold any truth.
meanings.sent5: The leakiest boat sank within minutes of hitting the water.

meanings.definition: Having the most leaks compared to others.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the containers, the leakiest one was the plastic bottle.
meanings.sent2: The roof of the leakiest house in the neighborhood needed constant patching.
meanings.sent3: The leakiest faucet in the house played a symphony of drips every night.
meanings.sent4: His promises were the leakiest, always breaking at the slightest pressure.
meanings.sent5: The leakiest bucket in the group couldn't hold a drop without spilling.
